Text: Tripwire and Risk management Cc Rick I am sure the merger is keeping you busy enough for two people Tripwire is helping companies like yours manage their technology risk keeping them in revenue producing mode Who on your team would have some cycles to speak with me for min about a potential fit between our organizations To future success Chris Risenhoover Regional Account Manager Tripwire Inc voice fax ripwirecom wwwTripwirecom Boldness has genius power and magic in it Goethe
